Declare @vchSQL varchar(8000) Declare @bigsql varchar(8000)
set @vchSQL = 'use [' + @DBName + '] IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N''[dbo].[usp_ExcludeLoansByUploadID]'') AND type in (N''P'', N''PC'')) DROP PROCEDURE [dbo].[usp_ExcludeLoansByUploadID] ' exec (@vchSQL)
set @vchSQL =' CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[usp_ExcludeLoansByUploadID] ( @UploadedID bigint, @DimPoolId bigint, @ExcludeECName nvarchar(100) ) AS Begin
Declare @DimECID bigint
select @DimECID = DimECID from dbo.tblDimEC where CriteriaName = @ExcludeECName and DimPoolID = @DimPoolId
if @DimECId IS Not Null begin
delete dbo.tblFactLoanECResult where DimPoolID =@DimPoolId and DimECID = @DimECId
Insert into dbo.tblFactLoanECResult(DimPoolID,DimLoanID,DimECID) select @DimPoolId as DimPoolId, fl.DimLoanID as DimLoanId, @DimECId as DimECId from dbo.tblUploadedFileDetails uf (nolock) inner join dbo.tblFactLoan fl (nolock) on uf.AccountNo = fl.AccountNo where uf.UploadID = @UploadedID and fl.DimPoolID = @DimPoolId and uf.Included = 0
update dbo.tblFactLoan set IsIncluded = 0 where DimPoolID= @DimPoolId and DimLoanID in (select DimLoanID from dbo.tblFactLoanECResult where DimPoolID = @DimPoolId and DimECID = @DimECId)
End else Begin raiserror(''''Can not find Exclude EC ID by EC Name'''',16,1) End End'
SET @BigSQL = 'USE [' + @DBName + ']; EXEC sp_executesql N''' + @vchSQL + ''''; EXEC (@BigSQL)
